titles: Encouragements. For such as shall have intention to bee vnder-takers in the new plantation of Cape Briton, now New Galloway in America, by mee Lochinvar·
author: Gordon, Robert, Sir, d. 1627?
notes: Running title reads: Encouragements for New Galloway.
